title: Strengthen Yourself in the Lord: How to Release the Hidden Power of God in Your Life
description: It's time to be strong and of good courage.Today's believer is faced with situations unknown fifty, thirty, even twenty years ago. To stand in victory and enter our hour of promotion is to learn how to Strengthen Yourself in the Lord. You will learn how * Encourage yourself.* Overcome seriously bad days.* Stay connected to your destiny.* Access Heaven's open door.* Disarm hell with thanksgiving. How can you "count it all joy"when facing turmoil at home, work, or within your family? Author Bill Johnson tells you how through Scripture and personal experience. You can be strong when you know the keys to encouraging yourself looking past failure and into a successful future.
author: Bill Johnson
